name: The Adventures Of Decku
description:
During their third mission in space, the crew of the apollo 27 accidentally stumbled into a GIGANTIC  WORMHOLE.

The crew was teleported along with the ship into an alternate dimension.
Here, reality is in constant flux and fragments of the real universe leaks into it.
Decku who was the payload specialist was turned into a PACK OF CARDS. Now he wanders the wastelands of SPACE, searching for the rest of the crew.
